welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Gose, Japan! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's rich history, picturesque landscapes, and delicious sake. We invite you to explore and experience all that Gose has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving domestic flights within Japan.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Itami Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kansai International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Kansai International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network for up to 2 hours per day.
